messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] unschooling in sc
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 9/18/2002 2:25:28 AM Eastern Daylight Time, ... Virginia, Call me! The state CANNOT take your kids away. South Carolina is actually one of
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 9/18/2002 2:25:28 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:
> I just had to speak up here and tell you how lucky you are. Your
> mother's concerns are only grounded in the fact that, in some states (SC is
> one. I live here.) they do take your kids if they don't like how you are
> schooling them. I think I will move to Arizona. I used to live in Tuscon
> (lifetimes ago). I could get used to the lack of humidity.
>

Virginia, Call me! The state CANNOT take your kids away. South Carolina is
actually one of the easier states to homeschool in. Please read the law. Sign
up with a 3rd option accountability association.

Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy, Coordinator
Schools Out Support
mailto:coordinator@...
803-776-4849
Fax: 803-776-7006
http://www.schoolsoutsupport.org
